But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. While Page and Sergey Brin founded the company, Eric Schmidt was brought in ten years ago to help manage the business side of Google. During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication. He can be extremely proud of the role he has played, including for the last eight months in Government. "I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one. In a lengthy section on the administration's treatment of wartime detainees, Donald Rumsfeld regrets not leaving office in May 2004, after the Abu Ghraib prison scandal erupted, The Washington Post said. Eric Schmidt , 55, has no doubt Page is ready for the challenges ahead. "Larry has been with me in every major decision in the past decade," Eric Schmidt said in an interview Thursday. It's not like he has been sitting around doing nothing. Although management by committee worked well enough to turn Google into an enormous success, it eventually slowed Google's reaction to popular new ideas such as Facebook and Twitter.
